page.title: 11BRAIDBAR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was intended to be used for {CO-OPERATIVE TEACHING} This means that each classroom is a{ {double unit}and can accomodate up to 60 children, and two teachers In fact due to{FALLING ROLLS}this is not the case Most of the double units contain only one class and one teacher. This has meant that we can spread ourselves out and have all sorts of interesting areas and corners in our rooms eg Computer Corners, Library Area, Tape Recording spots and quiet corners where you can research project topics. Unfortunately this year some of our classrooms are to be closed down and classes of different age groups squashed together to save on heating and lighting.
